verses.text: Now \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* relative \w on|strong="H8034"\w* \w her|strong="H3045"\w* husband’s side, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prominent|strong="H2428"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* noble character \w from|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Elimelech, \w whose|strong="H8034"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* \w heads|strong="H7641"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w grain|strong="H7641"\w* after someone \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w whose|strong="H1323"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H4672"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w*.” “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* ahead, \w my|strong="H4672"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*,” \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* replied.

So Ruth \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w out|strong="H3212"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3212"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w gleaned|strong="H3950"\w* after \w the|strong="H3212"\w* harvesters. \w And|strong="H3212"\w* she \w happened|strong="H7136"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3212"\w* \w part|strong="H2513"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3212"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* belonging \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*, who \w was|strong="H4940"\w* \w from|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3212"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* Elimelech.

Just \w then|strong="H2009"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* arrived \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* harvesters, “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*.” “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3068"\w* replied.

\w And|strong="H5288"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* asked \w the|strong="H5921"\w* foreman \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* harvesters, “\w Whose|strong="H4310"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w woman|strong="H5291"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*?”

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* foreman \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.

\w She|strong="H1242"\w* \w has|strong="H2088"\w* said, ‘\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w sheaves|strong="H6016"\w* \w after|strong="H1242"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* harvesters.’ \w So|strong="H6258"\w* \w she|strong="H1242"\w* came \w out|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w has|strong="H2088"\w* \w continued|strong="H3427"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, except \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w she|strong="H1242"\w* rested \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w short|strong="H7114"\w* \w time|strong="H6258"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w shelter|strong="H1004"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w*, “\w Listen|strong="H8085"\w*, \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*. \w Do|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w another|strong="H2088"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w do|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w away|strong="H5674"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H2088"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w stay|strong="H1692"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w* \w close|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* servant \w girls|strong="H5291"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H6680"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* harvesting, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w follow|strong="H1980"\w* \w along|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H1980"\w* these girls. \w Indeed|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w ordered|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w*. \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w when|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w thirsty|strong="H6770"\w*, \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w jars|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* filled.”

\w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H6440"\w*, \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w bowing|strong="H7812"\w* low \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ground|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* such \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w should|strong="H4069"\w* \w take|strong="H5234"\w* \w notice|strong="H5234"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w even|strong="H5869"\w* though \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H5237"\w*?”

\w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w been|strong="H4194"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w fully|strong="H5046"\w* \w aware|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w mother-in-law|strong="H2545"\w* since \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* husband, \w how|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* father \w and|strong="H6030"\w* mother \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w birth|strong="H4138"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w how|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w repay|strong="H7999"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w receive|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rich \w reward|strong="H7999"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w under|strong="H8478"\w* whose \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H2620"\w* \w refuge|strong="H2620"\w*.”

“\w My|strong="H5921"\w* lord,” \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w continue|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w kindly|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w*, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* girls.”

\w At|strong="H3427"\w* \w mealtime|strong="H6256"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* said \w to|strong="H6256"\w* \w her|strong="H6642"\w*, “\w Come|strong="H5066"\w* \w over|strong="H3498"\w* \w here|strong="H1988"\w*; \w have|strong="H7646"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w dip|strong="H2881"\w* \w it|strong="H6256"\w* \w into|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w vinegar|strong="H2558"\w* sauce.” \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w she|strong="H6256"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w beside|strong="H6654"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* harvesters, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w offered|strong="H5066"\w* \w her|strong="H6642"\w* \w roasted|strong="H7039"\w* \w grain|strong="H7039"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w she|strong="H6256"\w* ate \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w was|strong="H3427"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w had|strong="H7646"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w over|strong="H3498"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1571"\w* Ruth \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w glean|strong="H3950"\w*, \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w ordered|strong="H6680"\w* \w his|strong="H6680"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w*, “\w Even|strong="H1571"\w* if \w she|strong="H1571"\w* gathers \w among|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w sheaves|strong="H6016"\w*, \w do|strong="H6680"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w insult|strong="H3637"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w*.

\w Rather|strong="H4480"\w*, \w pull|strong="H7997"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* stalks \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w bundles|strong="H6653"\w* \w and|strong="H1571"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w them|strong="H4480"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w gather|strong="H3950"\w*. Do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* Ruth \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* grain \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*. \w And|strong="H7704"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w she|strong="H6153"\w* \w beat|strong="H2251"\w* \w out|strong="H2251"\w* what \w she|strong="H6153"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w gleaned|strong="H3950"\w*, \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* ephah \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*.

\w She|strong="H5892"\w* \w picked|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* grain \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w town|strong="H5892"\w*, where \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w mother-in-law|strong="H2545"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w she|strong="H5892"\w* \w had|strong="H5414"\w* \w gleaned|strong="H3950"\w*. \w And|strong="H5892"\w* \w she|strong="H5892"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w she|strong="H5892"\w* \w had|strong="H5414"\w* \w saved|strong="H3498"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* meal \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* Naomi.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w* \w mother-in-law|strong="H2545"\w* asked \w her|strong="H5046"\w*, “Where \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* where \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w work|strong="H6213"\w*? \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* man \w who|strong="H6213"\w* \w noticed|strong="H5234"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*.” \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w she|strong="H5973"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w* \w mother-in-law|strong="H2545"\w* where \w she|strong="H5973"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w worked|strong="H6213"\w*. “\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* man \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w worked|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*,” \w she|strong="H5973"\w* said.

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* said \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w her|strong="H3618"\w* \w daughter-in-law|strong="H3618"\w*, “\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w withdrawn|strong="H5800"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.” \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* continued, “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w close|strong="H7138"\w* \w relative|strong="H1350"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* kinsman-redeemers.”

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w* said, “\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* told \w me|strong="H5973"\w*, ‘\w Stay|strong="H1692"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w gathering|strong="H1692"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.’”

\w And|strong="H7704"\w* \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w daughter-in-law|strong="H3618"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w*, “\w My|strong="H3318"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* work \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w young|strong="H5291"\w* \w women|strong="H1323"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w happen|strong="H6293"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3427"\w* Ruth \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w close|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* servant \w girls|strong="H5291"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* \w grain|strong="H2406"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* harvests \w were|strong="H3427"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w*. \w And|strong="H3427"\w* \w she|strong="H5704"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w her|strong="H5291"\w* \w mother-in-law|strong="H2545"\w*.
